title: What is being done about cheaters?
body:
So I went in to a bot game because of the new quest to see.. 3 bots vsing bots. Then I went into a ARAM only too see I am either vsing bots or I have bots.
This isn't a new things it has been going on for a while and now that the new XP reward system is in.. I have seen a very big increase in botting.

WHAT IS BEING DONE! This is getting be upon the joke. I stop playing WoW due the bots. I stop playing other games due to the amount of unchecked cheaters..
Now this game is getting to the point of it also. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

P.S 

My last game as Siv.. I was with 5 players vsing 4 bots and 1 player

replies.body: riot does care and reporting them does work

How about you prove it then, because i have proof in the fact that bot's still exist, you ain't got shit.

Botting sites have existed all this time, and it's not like Riot has even tried.

Bot's are extremely easy to detect, detectable within ~1-2 minutes, and are vastly different to how new players act (regardless of what Riot would tell you) by running down a lane, intent feeding and mashing all their ability buttons.

So again, please inform me how Riot has done anything and/or cares

Because here is a fact, if someone is buying an account, that is to level 30 through botting, they have disposable income, and are likely to buy skins and the like.

first off most the bans that they do comes in waves not one at a time as you see from all the players currently upset about the bans they have been given
second here is a link to riot sueing a bot company https://www.riftherald.com/2016/8/11/12438552/leaguesharp-lawsuit-lol-riot
third Did it ever occur to any ofthat there could be any number of reasons not to ban one particular bot?
 Where there is one mouse, there are usually more. Same with scripters, bots, w/e you want to call them. Would you rather kill one mouse, or the whole mess of em? What is to say that the human behind the comp does not have 100 other bots doing the same thing at the same time? If rito went and banned them all individually, then little comes of it. If they ban the head behind the computer, only then do they actually get rid of a problem.

Not trying to defend rito, but sometimes one needs to step back and look at the bigger picture/problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiejax,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=fvEl555O,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-27T08:18:36.265+0000)
>
> 
> Not trying to defend rito, but sometimes one needs to step back and look at the bigger picture/problem.

The issue is as simple as I have said.
Play a bot game at anytime.. They take smite and heal. They will go grom. Base. Go over the river to grom. Base. Then blue buff. Base. Then over the river take blue buff. Base.

See what i mean? When you level a new account the easy and fastest XP is 100% wins. That is going bots. End the game with into 15 mins and move onto the next one for fast XP.

But when you are the only player with 4 bots. It does get a bit insane when they are all doing what I said before.
This is a very easy way to detect bot players.
ARAM are the same again. They run up the lane just before minion wave has spawn and will wait for the very last minion. Then follow it into fight. Once it dies the bot will again run back to the next wave follow the last minion as it goes in. 

Once they die.. { Which they will a lot } they will go and wait for the wave and follow the last one again.

You cannot say " They need to check the coding input to see how they are doing it " WHEN IT IS RIGHT THERE.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}


Edit.

I bet 100% if they were botting rank. They would be ban with in seconds of the report.

If they ban the accounts individually as they spawn, then at the very least the botters have to make their programs act like normal human being's, in which case, who the fuck really cares at that point, at least they aren't playing like retards, and ruining the gaming experience.

As for the lawsuit you decided to pull up, League# was never the main botting group, it was just the only one Riot could legitmately target.

oh and let's face it, they haven't done anything useful by not banning the single accounts, if they do that, it means both the botters and Riot have to advance technology, which is actually the same thing that happens against many botting practices in other games.

yes but then you have the same thing as runescape ..... until a blackhat become a whitehat.
also would you like to then see bots out ranking u?
:) i wouldnt

I just did, your just a little too dense to realise i did, fact is "bots out ranking us" that would be scripters, which already happens.

Which mind you is also on the players to find.
Here is a really crazy idea, implement a Captcha check to queue for your game. Instant, elegant, solution. Will it be implemented? Doesn't stand a chance.

I understand that. I also think this should be done.
I leveled a new account for something I am working on and when you level in bots. It is really 4 bots vsing bots. I am the only player. They seem to just head into jungle now instead of lane.

But in ARAM they are ranked player's that are just flat out cheating for the XP reward.
So have a Captcha check is a good idea. But it would become insanely overwhelming if you only play ARAM. So I don't know if that would work to well.
aram not worth the investment in time now. if you AFK because it is a botted waste of time, you get suspended.

Nothing is being done.

Riot doesn't care, and if you report them, that's the only time that they MIGHT get rid of them.

Like just in the game I played then in ARAM this Yi was a bot.

If I was to show my GF account.. She only plays ARAM. She said " At least every 3 games I am getting bots or vsing bots ". When you think about it.. This is a really big thing Riot doesn';t seem to give a shit about.

i have also been on the receiving end of bot and i get how annoying it is but that also have ban waves where i see none for ages.
i figure they are just trying to learn more about the scripts before banning them
oh sorry what rank are you i barely ever see scripts in gold....?
